segments.pli: “Ānāpānassati, bhikkhave, bhāvitā bahulīkatā mahapphalā hoti mahānisaṃsā.
segments.en: “Mendicants, when mindfulness of breathing is developed and cultivated it’s very fruitful and beneficial.

segments.pli: Kathaṃ bhāvitā ca, bhikkhave, ānāpānassati kathaṃ bahulīkatā mahapphalā hoti mahānisaṃsā?
segments.en: And how is mindfulness of breathing developed and cultivated to be very fruitful and beneficial?

segments.pli: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ānāpānassatisahagataṃ satisambojjhaṅgaṃ bhāveti vivekanissitaṃ virāganissitaṃ nirodhanissitaṃ vossaggapariṇāmiṃ, ānāpānassatisahagataṃ dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgaṃ bhāveti … pe … ānāpānassatisahagataṃ upekkhāsambojjhaṅgaṃ bhāveti vivekanissitaṃ virāganissitaṃ nirodhanissitaṃ vossaggapariṇāmiṃ.
segments.en: It’s when a mendicant develops mindfulness of breathing together with the awakening factors of mindfulness, investigation of principles, energy, rapture, tranquility, immersion, and equanimity, which rely on seclusion, fading away, and cessation, and ripen as letting go.

segments.pli: Evaṃ bhāvitā kho, bhikkhave, ānāpānassati evaṃ bahulīkatā mahapphalā hoti mahānisaṃsā”ti.
segments.en: Mindfulness of breathing, when developed and cultivated in this way, is very fruitful and beneficial.”

sections.title: “Mendicants, when mindfulness of breathing is developed and cultivated…

suttaplex.blurb: Breath meditation is very beneficial. It is developed together with the seven factors of awakening.
